data:
*This article is about a previous release of [Crawl](/Crawl "Crawl"). For information about other versions of Crawl, including the newest, see [List of Stone Soup versions](/List_of_Stone_Soup_versions "List of Stone Soup versions").*

**0.18** is a version of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*. It was released on May 5th, 2016.

## Contents

- [1 Highlights](#Highlights)
- [2 Branches, Environment](#Branches.2C_Environment)
- [3 Character](#Character)
- [4 Gods](#Gods)
- [5 Items](#Items)
- [6 Monsters](#Monsters)
- [7 Spells](#Spells)
- [8 Interface](#Interface)

## Highlights

- New god: [Pakellas](/Pakellas "Pakellas") the Inventive.

## Branches, Environment

- Killing monsters in the [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss") eventually spawns exits and down-stairs.
- [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat") portals no longer appear in [Pan](/Pan "Pan").
- After clearing multiple ziggurats, enemies found in later ziggurats will be considerably more dangerous.
- The [Orcish Mines](/Orcish_Mines "Orcish Mines") are now two levels, and generate fewer plain orcs. Gold generation is doubled to account for the shorter branch.
- The [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls") now contains elementals and dancing weapons (in addition to the ones normally found in the Hall of Blades).

## Character

- A new mutation: [Sturdy Frame](/Sturdy_Frame "Sturdy Frame"), reducing base ER by 2/4/6 and thus making heavy armour easier to wear. Can be a [demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") mutation.
- [Formicids](/Formicid "Formicid") now have 0 [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing") aptitude (was -2).
- Taking a known [shaft](/Shaft "Shaft") now has a 2/3 chance of shafting one floor and 1/3 of two floors.
- Breath abilities are no longer mutations and are now unique to [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") and [nagas](/Naga "Naga").
- Throwing speed now works like weapons do, making it somewhat slower.
- Weapon types no longer have distinct strength weights. Strength now only gives a bonus to damage, and dexterity only gives a bonus to accuracy.
- Formicids can no longer dig while in most non-Formicid forms.
- [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") now gives somewhat more AC.
- Early-game attribute loss is recovered significantly more quickly.
- [rElec](/Electricity_resistance "Electricity resistance") now reduces damage by two-thirds, rather than three-quarters.

## Gods

- New temple god: Pakellas the Inventive.

  - Grants MP on kills and passive wand charge identification. MP gained while full will eventually be turned into potions of magic.
  - Blocks MP regeneration and hates channeling.
  - Gifts [wands](/Wand "Wand"), [rods](/Rod "Rod") and miscellaneous evokables.
  - 1\*: Quick Charge: uses a portion of current MP to recharge a wand or rod.
  - 3\*: Device Surge: spends variable MP to apply power enhancers to your next use of an evocable item.
  - 6\* capstone: Supercharge: sets a rod to +10 (18/18), or sets a wand's capacity to 50% above normal for that wand type.

- [Ashenzari](/Ashenzari "Ashenzari") now allows followers to curse items with an ability that consumes a scroll of remove curse, instead of using prayer to create curse scrolls.

- [Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh") no longer allows corpse sacrifice.

- New Beogh 6\* ability: Resurrection, reviving & converting dead orcs.

- Followers of [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon") can pacify insects (again).

- Monsters buffed by [Gozag](/Gozag "Gozag")'s wrath now remain buffed as long as they live.

- [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva") altars in Dungeon no longer appear as early.

- [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru")'s abilities now cost less piety, but don't last as long at low [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations") skill.

- Finesse is no longer blocked by stasis.

- Piety given for a [Ru](/Ru "Ru") sacrifice is more explicitly stated.

- [Sif Muna](/Sif_Muna "Sif Muna") now grants miscast protection at 2\* and amnesia at 4\*, rather than the other way around.

- [Xom](/Xom "Xom") now chaos brands more weapon gifts, and can chaos brand ranged weapons again.

- [Yredelemnul](/Yredelemnul "Yredelemnul")'s Enslave Soul can now affect demons & holy beings.

- Abandoning Yredelemnul now destroys your zombie minions.

- [Zin](/Zin "Zin")'s Recite is now only interrupted if the player is silenced or incapacitated (or goes berserk).

## Items

- New items:

  - The [amulet of dismissal](/Amulet_of_dismissal "Amulet of dismissal"), which may teleport away enemies that damage the player, but causes a brief combat penalty when equipped.
  - The [amulet of reflection](/Amulet_of_reflection "Amulet of reflection"), which grants a few points of shielding that act as a shield of reflection.
  - The [amulet of harm](/Amulet_of_harm "Amulet of harm"), which increases damage dealt to and by the wearer by 25%.
  - The [amulet of magic regeneration](/Amulet_of_magic_regeneration "Amulet of magic regeneration"), which increases MP regeneration after a warmup period.
  - The [ring of resist corrosion](/Ring_of_resist_corrosion "Ring of resist corrosion"), replacing the amulet.
  - [Wands of acid](/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid"), which cause significant damage and corrosion.
  - [Wands of iceblast](/Wand_of_iceblast "Wand of iceblast"), which cause a partially irresistible explosion of cold.
  - A [figurine of a ziggurat](/Figurine_of_a_ziggurat "Figurine of a ziggurat"), which can be evoked to create a ziggurat portal. Appears on Zig:27 of all ziggurats and in the Tomb:3 loot.
  - Unrand: The +8 frozen axe "[Frostbite](/Frostbite "Frostbite")" {freezing cloud, \*Noise +Fly rC+}, an executioner's axe that may create freezing clouds on those it strikes.
  - Unrand: The +12 [Armour of Talos](/Armour_of_Talos "Armour of Talos") {ponderous, rF+}, a troll/ogre-sized plate armour.
  - Unrand: The +3 [Warlock's Mirror](/Warlock%27s_Mirror "Warlock's Mirror") {reflection}, a buckler that allows reflection of piercing effects and enchantments, among other things.

- The [Etheric Cage](/Maxwell%27s_Etheric_Cage "Maxwell's Etheric Cage") now multiplies gained contam, instead of generating it.

- [Sniper](/Sniper "Sniper") can no longer miss, and is now +9 (formerly +15).

- The [robe of vines](/Robe_of_vines "Robe of vines") now grants slightly less regeneration.

- The [Majin-Bo](/Majin-Bo "Majin-Bo") now speaks occasionally.

- The [captain's cutlass](/Captain%27s_cutlass "Captain's cutlass") now causes bonus damage when disarming.

- The [amulet of Cekugob](/Amulet_of_Cekugob "Amulet of Cekugob") is now an amulet of dismissal.

- The [brooch of Shielding](/Brooch_of_Shielding "Brooch of Shielding") is now a +8 amulet of reflection with no AC or EV bonus.

- Wearing an [amulet of regeneration](/Amulet_of_regeneration "Amulet of regeneration") has no effect until the next time you are at full health.

- A new property can now generate on random artefacts: [Fragile](/Randarts#Properties "Randarts"), which destroys the item when it is removed.

- [Amulets of faith](/Amulets_of_faith "Amulets of faith") now grant a 25% bonus to piety, not a 33% bonus.

- Scrolls of [enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") & [enchant weapon](/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon") no longer remove curses.

- [Potions of ambrosia](/Potion_of_ambrosia "Potion of ambrosia") now bypass clarity.

- The evocable teleport property +Tele is removed. [Rings of teleportation](/Rings_of_teleportation "Rings of teleportation") now only have the \*Tele teleportitis effect.

- [Potions of cure mutation](/Potions_of_cure_mutation "Potions of cure mutation") are slightly more common.

- [Potions of degeneration](/Potions_of_degeneration "Potions of degeneration") now cause 1-3 damage to every stat.

- The Damnation card has been renamed to Exile.

- Poison needles' effects scale with Throwing skill and weapon enchantment.

- [Arrows](/Arrow "Arrow"), [bolts](/Bolt "Bolt") and [sling bullets](/Sling_bullet "Sling bullet") no longer have brands.

- Removed items:

  - Amulets of [resist mutation](/Amulet_of_resist_mutation "Amulet of resist mutation"), [stasis](/Amulet_of_stasis "Amulet of stasis"), [warding](/Amulet_of_warding "Amulet of warding"), and [corrosion](/Amulet_of_resist_corrosion "Amulet of resist corrosion").
  - Wands of [cold](/Wand_of_cold "Wand of cold"), [fire](/Wand_of_fire "Wand of fire"), [frost](/Wand_of_frost "Wand of frost"), [magic darts](/Wand_of_magic_darts "Wand of magic darts"), [invisibility](/Wand_of_invisibility "Wand of invisibility"), [draining](/Wand_of_draining "Wand of draining"), and [fireball](/Wand_of_fireball "Wand of fireball").
  - Rods of [destruction](/Rod_of_destruction "Rod of destruction") and [of the swarm](/Rod_of_the_swarm "Rod of the swarm").
  - [Ring of invisibility](/Ring_of_invisibility "Ring of invisibility").
  - [Potions of poison](/Potions_of_poison "Potions of poison").
  - Needles of [slowing](/Slowing "Slowing").
  - [Lanterns of shadows](/Lantern_of_shadows "Lantern of shadows").

## Monsters

- New monsters:

  - [Spark wasps](/Spark_wasp "Spark wasp"), electric swarming insects appearing in [Spider](/Spider "Spider") and [Depths](/Depths "Depths").
  - [Iron giants](/Iron_giant "Iron giant"), with the ability to throw you towards their pack of allies.
  - [Doom hounds](/Doom_hound "Doom hound"), who can howl to create a pack of dangerous creatures.
  - [Deep elf archers](/Deep_elf_archer "Deep elf archer"), with skill in archery and hexes.
  - [Deep elf elementalists](/Deep_elf_elementalist "Deep elf elementalist"), with mastery of elemental magic and the ability to turn rock into earth elementals to dig out entrenched foes.
  - [Dart slugs](/Dart_slug "Dart slug"), slow-moving, squishy gastropods with a ranged dart attack.
  - [Howler monkeys](/Howler_monkey "Howler monkey"), fast and extremely loud creatures, often found in packs.
  - [Rime drakes](/Rime_drake "Rime drake"), small flying lizards which breathe Flash Freeze.

- Shadow Fiends are now [Tzitzimimeh](/Tzitzimitl "Tzitzimitl"), made somewhat stronger and given attacks that surround their targets in a ring of miasma clouds.

- Hellfire has been renamed to [Damnation](/Damnation "Damnation"), and no longer melts ice.

- [Chaos champions](/Chaos_champion "Chaos champion") lose [Chaotic Mirror](/Chaotic_Mirror "Chaotic Mirror") and instead gain [Call of Chaos](/Call_of_Chaos "Call of Chaos"), an ability which applies (usually) positive status effects to nearby allies.

- [Mnoleg](/Mnoleg "Mnoleg") gains Call of Chaos (as above), [Random Bolt](/Random_Bolt "Random Bolt"), and [Dig](/Dig "Dig").

- [Gloorx Vloq](/Gloorx_Vloq "Gloorx Vloq") gains [Summon Executioners](/Summon_Executioners "Summon Executioners") and [Black Mark](/Black_Mark "Black Mark").

- [Liches](/Lich "Lich") and [Ancient liches](/Ancient_lich "Ancient lich") no longer have a long list of random spells, and return to a new set of fixed spellbooks.

- [Salamander stormcallers](/Salamander_stormcaller "Salamander stormcaller")' chant does not need to be continuous; they now only need to try to cast [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm") at their target three times for it to trigger.

- [Entropy weavers](/Entropy_weaver "Entropy weaver")' corrosion is now instant and smite-targeted, but only applies one level of corrosion.

- [Ice devils](/Ice_devil "Ice devil") are now tier 4 demons, and are weakened slightly.

- [Hellwings](/Hellwing "Hellwing") now have the swoop attack formerly possessed by blue devils.

- [Shock serpents](/Shock_serpent "Shock serpent")' discharge now only strikes whatever hit it.

- [Salamander mystics](/Salamander_mystic "Salamander mystic") lose [Localized Ignite Poison](/Localized_Ignite_Poison "Localized Ignite Poison").

- [Deep elf high priests](/Deep_elf_high_priest "Deep elf high priest") & [sorcerers](/Deep_elf_sorcerer "Deep elf sorcerer") can no longer cast [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon").

- [Natasha](/Natasha "Natasha"), [deep elf knights](/Deep_elf_knight "Deep elf knight"), and salamander stormcallers can no longer cast [Conjure Flame](/Conjure_Flame "Conjure Flame").

- [Banishment](/Banishment "Banishment") from powerful monsters can now send you deeper into the Abyss than Abyss:1.

- [Deep elf mages](/Deep_elf_mage "Deep elf mage") are now stronger and have new spell sets, including spells previously cast by deep elf conjurers and summoners.

- The Sap Magic effect from demonspawn warmongers now has three fixed levels of success rate penalty, rather than scaling continuously. Each spell cast while under the Sap effect has a fixed chance to increase the penalty level.

- Demonspawn corruptors' [Corrupt Body](/Corrupt_Body "Corrupt Body") spell is now a single-target version of the same spell used by wretched stars. These spells both now try to apply multiple levels of a single random temporary mutation instead of giving many different kinds.

- [Ancient champions](/Ancient_champion "Ancient champion") and [death knights](/Death_knight "Death knight") no longer have the [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt") spell.

- [Swamp worms](/Swamp_worm "Swamp worm") are now amphibious and generate submerged, emerging to attack the player and never resubmerging.

- Deep elf high priests now have an Aura of Brilliance spell that affects all allies in their view, making them cast spells more frequently and with more spell power.

- [Hell hogs](/Hell_hog "Hell hog") now have [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), replacing [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame").

- [Giant eyeballs](/Giant_eyeball "Giant eyeball") are now normal speed, but must stare thrice to paralyze.

- [Maurice](/Maurice "Maurice") can now steal from the floor as well as your inventory.

- Natasha no longer becomes weaker upon revival.

- [Death cobs](/Death_cob "Death cob") now drain speed, rather than causing hunger.

- Monsters that drain speed can now do so even to creatures with rN.

- Corroding monsters now reduces their AC by 8, rather than halving it.

- Needles no longer strike unaware monsters more powerfully.

- Removed monsters:

  - [Octopode crushers](/Octopode_crusher "Octopode crusher").
  - (Plain) [spiders](/Spider "Spider").
  - [Salamander firebrands](/Salamander_firebrand "Salamander firebrand").
  - [Blue devils](/Blue_devil "Blue devil").
  - [Brain worms](/Brain_worm "Brain worm").
  - [Deep elf fighters](/Deep_elf_fighter "Deep elf fighter"), [conjurers](/Deep_elf_conjurer "Deep elf conjurer"), [priests](/Deep_elf_priest "Deep elf priest"), and [summoners](/Deep_elf_summoner "Deep elf summoner").
  - [Trapdoor spiders](/Trapdoor_spider "Trapdoor spider").
  - [Fire drakes](/Fire_drake "Fire drake").

## Spells

- New spell: [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling") (L5 [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")/[Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations")). Dispels all cancellable effects on the target and, if any were dispelled, causes a damaging explosion of mutagenic energy around the victim.
- [Hydra Form](/Hydra_Form "Hydra Form") now has a fixed number of heads.
- The [Infusion](/Infusion "Infusion") spell has a lower power cap, scaling more quickly to the same damage bonus as before.
- [Song of Slaying](/Song_of_Slaying "Song of Slaying") now increases its slaying bonus with every kill, but caps at +9 total.
- [Tukima's Dance](/Tukima%27s_Dance "Tukima's Dance")'s power multiplier has been reduced.
- [Spectral Weapon](/Spectral_Weapon "Spectral Weapon") now bases the strength of the summoned weapon on spell power instead of weapon skill.
- [Alistair's Intoxication](/Alistair%27s_Intoxication "Alistair's Intoxication") is now level 5 and gives Vertigo status instead of confusing the player or draining Int, and can sometimes affect rPois monsters.
- [Monstrous Menagerie](/Monstrous_Menagerie "Monstrous Menagerie") is now level 7 (was 6).
- [Shadow Creatures](/Shadow_Creatures "Shadow Creatures") is now level 6 (was 5).
- [Passwall](/Passwall "Passwall") is now level 2 (was 3).
- [Ozocubu's Armour](/Ozocubu%27s_Armour "Ozocubu's Armour") now slows movement slightly while active.
- Removed spells: [Stoneskin](/Stoneskin "Stoneskin"), [Condensation Shield](/Condensation_Shield "Condensation Shield"), [Mass Confusion](/Mass_Confusion "Mass Confusion"), and [Phase Shift](/Phase_Shift "Phase Shift").

## Interface

- [Earth elementalists](/Earth_elementalist "Earth elementalist") now have their stones start on b.
- Characters starting with a primary ranged weapon now have their melee weapon on b by default.
- New autofight\_warning option, to combat accidentally holding down tab.
- An option is added to the butchering prompt to allow butchering only (e)dible corpses.
- Auto-eat now triggers for [ghouls](/Ghoul "Ghoul") if they are rotted.
- The religion screen now shows all god powers, with currently accessible powers (per level of piety) being highlighted.
- Many previously hardcoded forced mores are now optional and present in the default init.txt.
- New character dump option: skill\_gains, which shows when skills were gained.
- A s(T)atus effect lookup has been added to ?/.
html:
0.18

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
This article is about a previous release of Crawl. For information about other versions of Crawl, including the newest, see List of Stone Soup versions.

0.18 is a version of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup. It was released on May 5th, 2016.

Contents

  • 1 Highlights
  • 2 Branches, Environment
  • 3 Character
  • 4 Gods
  • 5 Items
  • 6 Monsters
  • 7 Spells
  • 8 Interface

Highlights

  • New god: Pakellas the Inventive.

Branches, Environment

  • Killing monsters in the Abyss eventually spawns exits and down-stairs.
  • Ziggurat portals no longer appear in Pan.
  • After clearing multiple ziggurats, enemies found in later ziggurats will be considerably more dangerous.
  • The Orcish Mines are now two levels, and generate fewer plain orcs. Gold generation is doubled to account for the shorter branch.
  • The Elven Halls now contains elementals and dancing weapons (in addition to the ones normally found in the Hall of Blades).

Character

  • A new mutation: Sturdy Frame, reducing base ER by 2/4/6 and thus making heavy armour easier to wear. Can be a demonspawn mutation.
  • Formicids now have 0 Throwing aptitude (was -2).
  • Taking a known shaft now has a 2/3 chance of shafting one floor and 1/3 of two floors.
  • Breath abilities are no longer mutations and are now unique to draconians and nagas.
  • Throwing speed now works like weapons do, making it somewhat slower.
  • Weapon types no longer have distinct strength weights. Strength now only gives a bonus to damage, and dexterity only gives a bonus to accuracy.
  • Formicids can no longer dig while in most non-Formicid forms.
  • Statue Form now gives somewhat more AC.
  • Early-game attribute loss is recovered significantly more quickly.
  • rElec now reduces damage by two-thirds, rather than three-quarters.

Gods

  • New temple god: Pakellas the Inventive.
    • Grants MP on kills and passive wand charge identification. MP gained while full will eventually be turned into potions of magic.
    • Blocks MP regeneration and hates channeling.
    • Gifts wands, rods and miscellaneous evokables.
    • 1*: Quick Charge: uses a portion of current MP to recharge a wand or rod.
    • 3*: Device Surge: spends variable MP to apply power enhancers to your next use of an evocable item.
    • 6* capstone: Supercharge: sets a rod to +10 (18/18), or sets a wand's capacity to 50% above normal for that wand type.
  • Ashenzari now allows followers to curse items with an ability that consumes a scroll of remove curse, instead of using prayer to create curse scrolls.
  • Beogh no longer allows corpse sacrifice.
  • New Beogh 6* ability: Resurrection, reviving & converting dead orcs.
  • Followers of Elyvilon can pacify insects (again).
  • Monsters buffed by Gozag's wrath now remain buffed as long as they live.
  • Jiyva altars in Dungeon no longer appear as early.
  • Okawaru's abilities now cost less piety, but don't last as long at low Invocations skill.
  • Finesse is no longer blocked by stasis.
  • Piety given for a Ru sacrifice is more explicitly stated.
  • Sif Muna now grants miscast protection at 2* and amnesia at 4*, rather than the other way around.
  • Xom now chaos brands more weapon gifts, and can chaos brand ranged weapons again.
  • Yredelemnul's Enslave Soul can now affect demons & holy beings.
  • Abandoning Yredelemnul now destroys your zombie minions.
  • Zin's Recite is now only interrupted if the player is silenced or incapacitated (or goes berserk).

Items

  • New items:
    • The amulet of dismissal, which may teleport away enemies that damage the player, but causes a brief combat penalty when equipped.
    • The amulet of reflection, which grants a few points of shielding that act as a shield of reflection.
    • The amulet of harm, which increases damage dealt to and by the wearer by 25%.
    • The amulet of magic regeneration, which increases MP regeneration after a warmup period.
    • The ring of resist corrosion, replacing the amulet.
    • Wands of acid, which cause significant damage and corrosion.
    • Wands of iceblast, which cause a partially irresistible explosion of cold.
    • A figurine of a ziggurat, which can be evoked to create a ziggurat portal. Appears on Zig:27 of all ziggurats and in the Tomb:3 loot.
    • Unrand: The +8 frozen axe "Frostbite" {freezing cloud, *Noise +Fly rC+}, an executioner's axe that may create freezing clouds on those it strikes.
    • Unrand: The +12 Armour of Talos {ponderous, rF+}, a troll/ogre-sized plate armour.
    • Unrand: The +3 Warlock's Mirror {reflection}, a buckler that allows reflection of piercing effects and enchantments, among other things.
  • The Etheric Cage now multiplies gained contam, instead of generating it.
  • Sniper can no longer miss, and is now +9 (formerly +15).
  • The robe of vines now grants slightly less regeneration.
  • The Majin-Bo now speaks occasionally.
  • The captain's cutlass now causes bonus damage when disarming.
  • The amulet of Cekugob is now an amulet of dismissal.
  • The brooch of Shielding is now a +8 amulet of reflection with no AC or EV bonus.
  • Wearing an amulet of regeneration has no effect until the next time you are at full health.
  • A new property can now generate on random artefacts: Fragile, which destroys the item when it is removed.
  • Amulets of faith now grant a 25% bonus to piety, not a 33% bonus.
  • Scrolls of enchant armour & enchant weapon no longer remove curses.
  • Potions of ambrosia now bypass clarity.
  • The evocable teleport property +Tele is removed. Rings of teleportation now only have the *Tele teleportitis effect.
  • Potions of cure mutation are slightly more common.
  • Potions of degeneration now cause 1-3 damage to every stat.
  • The Damnation card has been renamed to Exile.
  • Poison needles' effects scale with Throwing skill and weapon enchantment.
  • Arrows, bolts and sling bullets no longer have brands.
  • Removed items:
    • Amulets of resist mutation, stasis, warding, and corrosion.
    • Wands of cold, fire, frost, magic darts, invisibility, draining, and fireball.
    • Rods of destruction and of the swarm.
    • Ring of invisibility.
    • Potions of poison.
    • Needles of slowing.
    • Lanterns of shadows.

Monsters

  • New monsters:
    • Spark wasps, electric swarming insects appearing in Spider and Depths.
    • Iron giants, with the ability to throw you towards their pack of allies.
    • Doom hounds, who can howl to create a pack of dangerous creatures.
    • Deep elf archers, with skill in archery and hexes.
    • Deep elf elementalists, with mastery of elemental magic and the ability to turn rock into earth elementals to dig out entrenched foes.
    • Dart slugs, slow-moving, squishy gastropods with a ranged dart attack.
    • Howler monkeys, fast and extremely loud creatures, often found in packs.
    • Rime drakes, small flying lizards which breathe Flash Freeze.
  • Shadow Fiends are now Tzitzimimeh, made somewhat stronger and given attacks that surround their targets in a ring of miasma clouds.
  • Hellfire has been renamed to Damnation, and no longer melts ice.
  • Chaos champions lose Chaotic Mirror and instead gain Call of Chaos, an ability which applies (usually) positive status effects to nearby allies.
  • Mnoleg gains Call of Chaos (as above), Random Bolt, and Dig.
  • Gloorx Vloq gains Summon Executioners and Black Mark.
  • Liches and Ancient liches no longer have a long list of random spells, and return to a new set of fixed spellbooks.
  • Salamander stormcallers' chant does not need to be continuous; they now only need to try to cast Fire Storm at their target three times for it to trigger.
  • Entropy weavers' corrosion is now instant and smite-targeted, but only applies one level of corrosion.
  • Ice devils are now tier 4 demons, and are weakened slightly.
  • Hellwings now have the swoop attack formerly possessed by blue devils.
  • Shock serpents' discharge now only strikes whatever hit it.
  • Salamander mystics lose Localized Ignite Poison.
  • Deep elf high priests & sorcerers can no longer cast Summon Demon.
  • Natasha, deep elf knights, and salamander stormcallers can no longer cast Conjure Flame.
  • Banishment from powerful monsters can now send you deeper into the Abyss than Abyss:1.
  • Deep elf mages are now stronger and have new spell sets, including spells previously cast by deep elf conjurers and summoners.
  • The Sap Magic effect from demonspawn warmongers now has three fixed levels of success rate penalty, rather than scaling continuously. Each spell cast while under the Sap effect has a fixed chance to increase the penalty level.
  • Demonspawn corruptors' Corrupt Body spell is now a single-target version of the same spell used by wretched stars. These spells both now try to apply multiple levels of a single random temporary mutation instead of giving many different kinds.
  • Ancient champions and death knights no longer have the Haunt spell.
  • Swamp worms are now amphibious and generate submerged, emerging to attack the player and never resubmerging.
  • Deep elf high priests now have an Aura of Brilliance spell that affects all allies in their view, making them cast spells more frequently and with more spell power.
  • Hell hogs now have Fireball, replacing Sticky Flame.
  • Giant eyeballs are now normal speed, but must stare thrice to paralyze.
  • Maurice can now steal from the floor as well as your inventory.
  • Natasha no longer becomes weaker upon revival.
  • Death cobs now drain speed, rather than causing hunger.
  • Monsters that drain speed can now do so even to creatures with rN.
  • Corroding monsters now reduces their AC by 8, rather than halving it.
  • Needles no longer strike unaware monsters more powerfully.
  • Removed monsters:
    • Octopode crushers.
    • (Plain) spiders.
    • Salamander firebrands.
    • Blue devils.
    • Brain worms.
    • Deep elf fighters, conjurers, priests, and summoners.
    • Trapdoor spiders.
    • Fire drakes.

Spells

  • New spell: Yara's Violent Unravelling (L5 Hexes/Transmutations). Dispels all cancellable effects on the target and, if any were dispelled, causes a damaging explosion of mutagenic energy around the victim.
  • Hydra Form now has a fixed number of heads.
  • The Infusion spell has a lower power cap, scaling more quickly to the same damage bonus as before.
  • Song of Slaying now increases its slaying bonus with every kill, but caps at +9 total.
  • Tukima's Dance's power multiplier has been reduced.
  • Spectral Weapon now bases the strength of the summoned weapon on spell power instead of weapon skill.
  • Alistair's Intoxication is now level 5 and gives Vertigo status instead of confusing the player or draining Int, and can sometimes affect rPois monsters.
  • Monstrous Menagerie is now level 7 (was 6).
  • Shadow Creatures is now level 6 (was 5).
  • Passwall is now level 2 (was 3).
  • Ozocubu's Armour now slows movement slightly while active.
  • Removed spells: Stoneskin, Condensation Shield, Mass Confusion, and Phase Shift.

Interface

  • Earth elementalists now have their stones start on b.
  • Characters starting with a primary ranged weapon now have their melee weapon on b by default.
  • New autofight_warning option, to combat accidentally holding down tab.
  • An option is added to the butchering prompt to allow butchering only (e)dible corpses.
  • Auto-eat now triggers for ghouls if they are rotted.
  • The religion screen now shows all god powers, with currently accessible powers (per level of piety) being highlighted.
  • Many previously hardcoded forced mores are now optional and present in the default init.txt.
  • New character dump option: skill_gains, which shows when skills were gained.
  • A s(T)atus effect lookup has been added to ?/.
